# azurite

Markdown to HTML parser with Obsidian WikiLinks support.

# Project Structure

```
.
├── .github
│   ├── LICENSE
│   └── README.md
├── dist                    # Output directory for compiled .html files
├── notes                   # Source directory of .md note files for parsing
├── src                     # Source code
│   └── lib                 # Shared utils used in the source code
├── tsconfig.json
```
